gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.gmm

Class AtkinsonBoore_2006

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.gmm.AtkinsonBoore_2006
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConvertsMag, GroundMotionModel

    public abstract class AtkinsonBoore_2006
extends Object
implements GroundMotionModel, ConvertsMag
    Abstract implementation of the ground motion model for stable continental regions by Atkinson & Boore (2006). This implementation matches that used in the 2008 USGS NSHMP. In addition to have two stress-drop scaling variants, this model also comes in magnitude converting (mb to Mw) flavors to support the 2008 central and eastern US model.

    Note: Direct instantiation of GroundMotionModels is prohibited. Use Gmm.instance(Imt) to retrieve an instance for a desired Imt.

    Implementation note: this uses a reduced set of frequencies that correspond most closely to defined Imts.

    Implementation note: Mean values are clamped per GmmUtils.ceusMeanClip(Imt, double).

    Reference: Atkinson, G.M., and Boore, D.M., 2006, Earthquake ground-motion prediction equations for eastern North America: Bulletin of the Seismological Society of America, v. 96, p. 2181â€“2205.

    doi: 10.1785/0120050245

    Component: horizontal (not clear from publication)

    Author:
    Peter Powers
    See Also:
    Gmm.AB_06_140BAR, Gmm.AB_06_140BAR_AB, Gmm.AB_06_140BAR_J, Gmm.AB_06_200BAR, Gmm.AB_06_200BAR_AB, Gmm.AB_06_200BAR_J
